TopicTitle: didnt find any suitable forum but i think this is the best...

Articles.Content: that's actually a problem with the forums system. when users embeding a pic in a comment i cant see it. how do i fix this?

Not sure what you mean, but open this post please: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97586-Eclipse?p=1491873&viewfull=1#post1491873

It should have two images. Can you see them? If not can you then please provide a screenshot, and tell us which browser and add-ons you are using?

Not sure what you mean, but open this post please: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97586-Eclipse?p=1491873&viewfull=1#post1491873

It should have two images. Can you see them? If not can you then please provide a screenshot, and tell us which browser and add-ons you are using?

before all, thanks to moving my thread to the relevant place.

well, now i see them. it took for my computer a little time too show them. but im sure that in several threads i didnt see the pics. i'll check again...

EDIT: here is the thread i cant see images in it:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97648-Help-changing-an-orbit

im using chrome. my browser add-ons are adblock, avira browser safety and google docs. should i take a screenshot?

Edited October 21, 2014 by JtPB
Yes please, also try running the browser with all extensions disabled. I believe browsing in incognito mode also disabled all extensions, so try that and see if it makes a difference.
